title: Create a Shopify Theme template for Nx

name.description: The name of the new theme template
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

project.description: The name of the project where the template will be generated.
project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project for this template?

directory.description: Create the template under this directory relative to src/theme/templates (can be nested).

flat.description: Create template files at the directory root rather than its own directory.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new template.
